typeSystemDescription.name: txtfnnlTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: A universal type system for the entire txtfnnl pipeline.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.TextAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotations on a specific text span.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: A URI identifying the annotator (humans: e-mail, automated: URL).

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The annotator's confidence in this annotation (range: (0,1]).

featureDescription.name: namespace
featureDescription.description: The namespace URL defining the annotation type system (e.g., the URL of the used ontology).

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: The annotation type ID that should usually form a fully valid URL by joining the namespace and this value with a slash ("/").

featureDescription.name: properties
featureDescription.description: Additional, free-form properties for this annotation.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.SofaAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A base type for SOFA-wide annotations.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: A URI identifying the annotator (humans: e-mail, automated: URL).

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The annotator's confidence in this annotation (range: (0,1]).

featureDescription.name: namespace
featureDescription.description: The namespace URL defining the annotation type system (e.g., the URL of the used ontology).

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: The annotation type ID that should usually form a fully valid URL by joining the namespace and this value with a slash ("/").

featureDescription.name: properties
featureDescription.description: Additional, free-form properties for this annotation.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.RelationshipAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotations of relationships between text annotations. All listed source participants interact with all listed target participants (i.e., add all particpants to both slots to create/indicate undirected relationships).

featureDescription.name: sources
featureDescription.description: Source participants in this relationship.

featureDescription.name: targets
featureDescription.description: Target participants in this relationship.

featureDescription.name: isAuto
featureDescription.description: Allow interactions between annotations that are both in source and target (i.e., "self-interactions").

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.cas.Property
typeDescription.description: A free-form property structure for annotations.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of this property.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of this property.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.SyntaxAnnotation
typeDescription.description: TextAnnotations of syntactic elements (text segements such as sentences, tokens, etc.).

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.SemanticAnnotation
typeDescription.description: TextAnnotations of semantic elements (PoS, named entities, etc.).

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.StructureAnnotation
typeDescription.description: TextAnnotations of text structure (sections, paragraphs, headings, typeface, sub- and superscript, etc.)

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.TokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A subtype for tokens with additional features for the PoS and chunk tag and the token's stem.

featureDescription.name: pos
featureDescription.description: The part-of-speech tag for this token.

featureDescription.name: stem
featureDescription.description: The stem or lemma of this token.

featureDescription.name: chunk
featureDescription.description: The chunk tag of this token.

featureDescription.name: inChunk
featureDescription.description: TRUE if this token is part of a chunk that started with an earlier token.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.SentenceAnnotation
typeDescription.description: An explicit text annoation type for sentences to simplify their index retrieval.

typeDescription.name: txtfnnl.uima.tcas.PhraseAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A phrasal annotation, including a pointer to its parent (or null for the root phrase)

featureDescription.name: parent
featureDescription.description: The parent phrase or null for the root.
